entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 100 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
